sentences.en: The idea of God is a projection of humans' need to have something greater than themselves.

sentences.en: With the advent of projection in 1895-1896, motion pictures became the ultimate form of mass consumption.
sentences.cn: 随着1895到1896年间投影技术的出现，电影成为大众消费的最终形式。
